title: Gemcraft 2 Chasing Shadows v1.0.12 Cracked_Rev.3 Works on Linux
description:
Hopefully this is the last revision of this I will have to release..

What has been changed from the original:

- Can play it locally from your hard-drive

- Can play it even with an old flash version (which means linux users can play it)

- Premium mode is enabled, so you have access to all skills, and also endurance mode

Endurance mode makes the game really easy though, so you might want to avoid using it unless you are stuck..

Notes:
It seems to have problems with chrome for some reason, I'm not sure why.. You can try running it on firefox, or use the stand-alone flash projector..

Locally saved games work fine..

Also, the graphics glitches are now fixed, so you can drag gems around just fine..

Also, revision 2 was freezing at the end of field F3.. This is fixed in revision 3..

I think/hope that I shouldn't have to fix any more problems with this.. I tested it a little and every thing seems to work fine this time.. Have fun..
